Scoring rubrics are descriptive scoring schemes that are developed by teachers or other evaluators to guide the analysis of the products or processes of students ' efforts ( Brookhart , 1999 ) .Scoring rubrics are typically employed when a judgment of quality is required and may be used to evaluate a broad range of subjects and activities .
